articles.description: Ashton Riner placed first in the javelin, highlighted by an opening throw of 57.25m/187-10. Teammate Alex McAllister qualified by finishing seventh with a throw of 52.26m/171-5.
articles.content: Three BYU womens track and field athletes qualified for the NCAA outdoor track and field championships after Thursdays performances in the west preliminary round at John McDonnell Field in Fayettevil… [+1983 chars]
